lender.name: Audrey
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a business without any money at all. So I know that the money that will be raised through my giving and the giving of the women in my network will help another woman start to live her dream of starting her own business.
lender.occupational_info: I inspire and empower people by bringing them stories from other women in business. I empower them through the articles that I write an by giving them the best of the knowledge that I've acquired.

lender.name: Moyra

lender.name: Caylin

lender.name: Mindy
lender.loan_because: "Is not this the fast that I choose: to loose the bonds of wickedness, to undo the straps of the yoke, to let the oppressed go free, and to break every yoke? Is it not to share your bread with the hungry and bring the homeless poor into your house; when you see the naked, to cover him, and not to hide yourself from your own flesh? Then shall your light break forth like the dawn, and your healing shall spring up speedily; your righteousness shall go before you; the glory of the LORD shall be your rear guard. Then you shall call, and the LORD will answer; you shall cry, and he will say, 'Here I am.' If you take away the yoke from your midst, the pointing of the finger, and speaking wickedness, if you pour yourself out for the hungry and satisfy the desire of the afflicted, then shall your light rise in the darkness and your gloom be as the noonday. And the LORD will guide you continually and satisfy your desire in scorched places and make your bones strong; and you shall be like a watered garden, like a spring of water, whose waters do not fail." -Isaiah 58:6-11

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because:
"The more I help others to succeed, the more I succeed." - Ray Kroc
"To do more for the world than the world does for you - that is success." - Henry Ford

lender.occupational_info: I work at a high school as an IT Support Officer and am studying part-time for my masters degree in network management. I regularly volunteer, including being IT coordinator for an agricultural society for a local community.

lender.name: Benita
lender.loan_because: am a God fearing and devoted daughter of the most high and i deprive pleasure by helping the needy with financial assistance
lender.occupational_info:
BENITA LORI LOAN COMPANY
Loan Services Offered (Apply For A Loan)
Are you a business man or woman? Are you in any financial stress or do you need funds to start up your own business? Do you need loan to settle your debt or pay off your bills or start a nice business?
Do you have a low credit score and you are finding it hard to obtain a loan from local banks and other financial institutes? Do you need a loan or funding for any reason such as:
a) Personal Loan, Business Expansion. b) Business Start-up and Education. c) Debt Consolidation. d) Hard Money Loans.
We offer loan at 2% interest rate and with no credit check, we offer Personal loan, debt consolidation loan, venture capital, business loan, education loan, home loan or loan for any reason!.
However, Our method offers you the chance to state the amount of loan needed and also the duration you can afford. This gives you a real chance to get the funds you need. Any interested Applicants should fill and return the loan application form below.
FILL AND RETURN THE LOAN APPLICATION FORM FOR THE IMMEDIATE PROCESSING OF YOUR LOAN APPLICATION
BORROWERS INFORMATION First Name:..................... Last Name:.................. Permanent Address:.................... City/Zip Code:.................. Country:.................... Gender:................... Date of birth (yyyy-mm-dd):...............
LOAN INFORMATION Amount Needed:.................. Loan Terms & Duration:..................... Monthly Income:.................... Valid Telephone/Fax:........................ Purpose For The Loan: Business Personal:...................... Name/Background Of Company:.................................
FOR MORE INQUIRIES CONTACT US VIA EMAIL BELOW
benitaloriinvestment@hotmail.com
Note:all applicant must be above the age of 18yrs.
Regards, Mrs. Benita Lori.
OUR MISSION IS TO ASSIST THE POOR AND NEEDY FINANCIALLY!!!!

lender.name: Scott Kinnaird
lender.loan_because: Liberty requires self-sufficiency. Direct, small-business lending - as opposed to simple charity - creates a vehicle for building sustainable self-sufficiency. This is the best way I know to help eliminate poverty while cultivating a fertile ground for Liberty.
lender.occupational_info: I work with bright, young people to build and sell products and services to real estate industry professionals. We help make their business more efficient so they can make more money.

lender.name: Eve Chocolatier
lender.loan_because: We believe in the strength, courage, dignity and determination of every entrepreneur across the planet. Our lending goal is to fuel the entrepreneurial spirit to help individuals realize their dreams. Our team in made up of Eve Chocolatier employees, suppliers, customers, family and friends.
lender.occupational_info: The heart and soul of Eve Chocolatier is the desire to create simple pleasures, chocolates and confections that are made with good, natural ingredients. Using time-honoured techniques, the creation of our chocolates is based around the idea that a gift, even for oneself, should be beautiful.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because:
I want to help. I can. I should. I must.
I didn't control where I was born, who my parents were or what decisions they, or any of my ancestors made. But I can control the the impact I make and helping people access credit and financial services sounds like a sensible place to start.
lender.occupational_info:
I study Japanese and law at the Australian National University
The picture is from a recently held jelly eating competition at work. No hands or utensils allowed, of course. I'm wiping some of the jelly off my chin. Having the freedom to gorge on jelly in my lunch break carries with it the obligation to help right some of the injustices of wealth distribution, I reckon.
